result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí

result.eng: It is not very warm in the bedroom.

result.eng: There are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.

result.eng: I like the hall and the sitting room.

result.eng: There are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
